name: gluttony
caption: Gluttony

effect.short: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low [HP]{mechanic:hp} below 1/2 its max HP.
effect.full: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low [HP]{mechanic:hp} when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.

flavorText:
Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP
drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
